company_context: HOME | Fortifyedge top of page Schedule a demo Personalized multi-modal on-device AI software for Wearables enabling Human-Machine Teaming bottom of page

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Emily and I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. I came across Fortifyedge and was impressed with your work in wearable technology and human-machine teaming. I'd love to discuss how our data processing solution can help you unlock more insights from your device data.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Ah, DeepData AI. We've heard of you, but I'm not sure how your solution would be relevant to our current priorities. We're pretty busy with our own AI developments right now. What makes you think we need your help?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand you're busy, but our solution can actually help you accelerate your AI development by providing more efficient and scalable data processing. This can lead to faster iteration and improvement of your wearable technology. We've seen significant ROI with similar companies in the industry.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I'm not convinced. We've already invested heavily in our own data infrastructure, and I'm not sure I want to add another vendor to the mix. Plus, I've heard your solution is on the pricier side. How do you plan to justify the cost?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand your concerns about cost, but our solution is designed to provide long-term value by reducing data processing time and increasing accuracy. As for integration, we have a robust API that can be easily integrated with your existing infrastructure. We've also had success with similar integrations in the past.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate the pitch, but to be honest, this isn't a priority for us right now. We're in the middle of a critical development phase, and I don't have the bandwidth to consider new vendors or solutions. We're also exploring partnerships with other companies that might be able to provide similar capabilities.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand that timing is everything, and I respect your priorities. However, I'd like to offer a trial or pilot to demonstrate the value of our solution. This would allow you to test our solution without making a significant commitment.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate the offer, Emily, but I'm going to have to decline. We're just too busy with our current projects, and I don't see this as a priority for the next quarter. Please don't take it personally, but we need to focus on our own developments right now.
